Note: Title supplied by cataloger. "Poster No. 129." ""W.9147. 20M. 9/15" appears on the bottom right of poster. Orientation: Vertical.
Description: A recruiting poster with no text.  A British officer beckons (or orders?)  the viewer to enlist.
Digital Collection: Allied Posters of World War I
Series: Poster (Great Britain. Parliamentary Recruiting Committee) ; no. 129.
